javadoc: A dialog with an OK button.  The client can specify the message type in the constructor.

methods.name: show
methods.comment: Show a OptionDialog#PLAIN_MESSAGE OkDialog with the given title and message

methods.name: showInfo
methods.comment:
Show a OptionDialog#INFORMATION_MESSAGE OkDialog with the given 
 title and message

methods.name: showError
methods.comment:
Show a OptionDialog#ERROR_MESSAGE OkDialog with the given 
 title and message

name: OkDialog
comment: A dialog with an OK button.  The client can specify the message type in the constructor.
